item.title: A Learning-based Data Augmentation for network anomaly Detection
item.description: Round-1: Overview Round-2: Model Implementation Details Round-3: Experiments Citation al Olaimat, M., Lee, D., Kim, Y., Kim, J., & Kim, J. (2020). A Learning-based Data Augmentation for Network Anomaly Detection. International Conference on Computer Communications and Networks, ICCCN, 2020-August. https://doi.org/10.1109/ICCCN49398.2020.9209598 Abstract While machine learning technologies have been remarkably advanced over the past several years, one of the fundamental requirements for the success of learning-based approaches would be the availability of high-quality data that thoroughly represent individual classes in a problem space.
